traits.name: Powerful Build
entries: Sken counts as one size larger when determining her carrying capacity and the weight she can push, drag, or lift.

traits.name: Special Equipment
entries: Sken wears a ring of obscuring. With it, she can cast the {@spell fog cloud} spell centered on herself three times per day. The cloud lasts for 1 minute (no {@status concentration} required).

actions.name: Longsword
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3 damage) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3 damage) slashing damage when used with two hands.
